overview: They're back. When super-hot wives feel underappreciated, they're going to make their husbands pay, by turning them into helpless witnesses. These dumb men have to watch their wives get down, dirty, and sloppy with another dude. No looking away as the hottest chicks with the most rock-star bodies have the sweetest sex-a-thons. This second volume is a sure lesson to treat your ladies right.
title: Revenge Cuckold 2
